website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for pets that love variety, as it's packed with lots of pieces that appeal to many piggies. However, some prefer classic pellets.
pros: Most guinea pigs love the variety of this mixed diet that includes hay, grains, seeds, fruits, vegetables, and miniature crunchy biscuits
Contains probiotics to aid digestion and extra vitamin C to boost immunity
Can be given as part of a complete diet or as an occasional treat
cons: Not ideal for very young pets
Some guinea pigs picked around some of the pieces

customer_reviews.title: and this one is great. Little background on my guinea pig
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY food my little guinea pig will eat. I have tried many brands, and this one is great. Little background on my guinea pig... With other brands of food, she would eat all the goodies in the mix and leave the pellets. So, not only was she not getting the nutrition she needed, I was going through a lot of food. With this brand she eats the entire thing. Not only is the price great, but the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: april janutka

customer_reviews.title: Smells fresh and my Guinea pig, Lulu likes this food a lot.
customer_reviews.text: My little pig loves this food. The only downside is that she will push it out of the bowl sometimes to find the goodies, but if I make sure it is mixed well with the goodies well dispersed, this is tolerable. I'd only eat the best parts too if I was a fat, happy Guinea pig with a good life. :) This is the only food she will not excessively pick through and push out of her bowl. She does push some out, but if I make sure to not top off the bowl, I can add a little fresh mix which makes her eat it better.
customer_reviews.author: Judith L.

customer_reviews.title: My Guinea Pigs Love This Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: After I read the reviews, I decided to give this a try and bought a 5lbs bag. My girls LOVE this stuff. Just like in the other reviews, they start to squeal when I bring out the bag. They barely touched their old pellet food, but demolish this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kami

customer_reviews.title: Happy guinea pig!
customer_reviews.text: Our little piggie loves this stuff! We always buy the large bag, and although it is slightly more expensive than other brands, you get way more for the money.. so a bag lasts twice as long as the stuff we usually would get at Pet Smart. I love how there is so much variety in the bag.. the food can't be too boring for our little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Mihalik

customer_reviews.title: My bunny, Walter, loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This food is awesome! Walter our 12 year old bunny freaking loves this! When given other brands, he picks out the pieces he likes and leaves the hay pellets in the bowl. He eats ALL the food in his bowl with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Faith H.

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.text: Stinky loves this, there are a lot of fruits and veggies and he doesn't just shove it out of his bowl like he has done some. I will continue to buy this as long as he is happy, it is very fresh and did ship quickly.
customer_reviews.author: noone

customer_reviews.title: Pigs are not fans of it
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs would probably leave a 2 star review if they could, but I am giving it 4 since it’s not necessarily the manufacturer’s fault they don’t care for it. They will only eat the kibble, and grudgingly it seems, since it takes them a while to even want to eat the kibble. We’ll be going back to Oxbow after this. I can only speak for my two pigs, others may have a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Bruan J.

customer_reviews.title: My bunnies favorite chow
customer_reviews.text: My bunnies love this chow!!! It's a little bit more expensive than other brands but there's a lot less waste because they eat it all rather than picking out the pieces they like.
customer_reviews.author: kim wiltberger

customer_reviews.title: Not for Guinea Pigs!  HAS SEEDS
customer_reviews.text: This food isn't for Guinea pigs. They are not supposed to have seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A. Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs didn't like, they just picked out the treats. Pellets were almost turned to dust in bag, maybe the bag was old? Will not buy product again.
customer_reviews.author: Lovz 2 Shop

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig will settle for no other nibbles
customer_reviews.text: He squeals and squeals when we're out of these. Quite the piggy hissy fit he has until we restock. Thank goodness for fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H

customer_reviews.title: Piggies refused to eat most of it ...
customer_reviews.text: My piggies picked out the hay pellets & dumped the rest. Have since read that seeds aren't good for them (I guess they knew better than to eat them.)
customer_reviews.author: Angela Burke

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Pig Food!!
customer_reviews.text: My guinea loves this food! He eats all the fruits first and then does his best to disregard the pellets, but this is by far his favorite food we've tried. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Picky Gunie
customer_reviews.text: It has a great taste. He is very happy now. And he is so picky
customer_reviews.author: Donna Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality food
customer_reviews.text: The best quality food I have found for my piggies they love it they have been on this food over a year and we are completely happy with it. The price is a little steep but it has lots of dried fruit and seeds so you get what you pay for. I would definitely recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Pigs hate it.
customer_reviews.text: Pigs wont touch it. Cant understand why it has seeds in it. They arent supposed to eat seeds.
customer_reviews.author: tbalke2012

customer_reviews.title: Taste and price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My pigs love it and for the price it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mike Delware

customer_reviews.title: The only kind I buy
customer_reviews.text: Definitely great for 2 guinea pigs! They sure do love it. I give some to my hamster too. Always comes fresh and with an experation date labeled
customer_reviews.author: B S

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pig's favorite food
customer_reviews.text: Both my Guinea pigs love this mix and eat all the seeds and dried fruit/veggies first. One of my pigs loves the pumpkin seeds so much he will push everything else aside until he finds them all. Packaging is well sealed and easy to open/close.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pigs love it.
customer_reviews.text: My Guinea pigs love it and it has a very good smell like fresh fruits. Careful though it has to be given together with veggies as the pets might get fat too.
customer_reviews.author: Eleazar La Palma

customer_reviews.title: My Two guinea pigs eat very well.
customer_reviews.text: My Two guinea pigs eat very well. They especially like dried fruits. It can be fed for about two months and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Hyuna cresta

customer_reviews.title: Guinea approved
customer_reviews.text: Our Guineas love these treats! This is the first time we tried this brand - we use the food already - a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda K

customer_reviews.title: This is the only food my guinea pig will eat.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried multiple different brands, spending a bunch of money on different brands. Only to feed it to him and the next morning I find his bowl overturned. This is the only brand he’ll eat. It’s a tad pricier than other brands. But the money I’m saving by buying food I know he won’t eat is worth it. Highly recommend if you want a happy pig
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Have been buying at pet store in smaller bag and this is much better.
customer_reviews.author: M Kaus

customer_reviews.title: its okay but...
customer_reviews.text: My two guinea pigs likes it but then I discovered that it had insects in it. disgusting. it had a bug i don’t know what its called and I just saw a worm... you can definitely buy better quality than this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Villalba

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: My rabbits and guinea pigs love this stuff. I purchase the 5 lb bag along with a 25 lb bag of pellets. I mix 4 cups of pellets with a cup of carnival feed then feed my rabbits and guinea pigs the mixture. This way I keep them eating the pellets and they get a nice treat mixed in with it.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our pigs love this food, they don't just pick through it and kick the rest on the cage bottom.
customer_reviews.author: C. Henn

customer_reviews.title: My guineas love these!
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs (two 7 month males) can not get enough of these pellets, and they are picky eaters. I have tried others, but they absolutely love these! The only thing is they eat everything but the brown small pellets, which is odd, but alot better then other pellets.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Smells yummy
customer_reviews.text: Piglets seem to like it a lot. It's not like the cheap stuff sold at my local super market. These piggies are getting to be expensive. One bag lasted only two weeks (we've 5 guinea pigs). I feel it's a bit pricey but the quality is definitely better.
customer_reviews.author: Livia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this product often and it is for my grandson - 8 guinea pigs
customer_reviews.author: Allen J. Wirta

customer_reviews.title: Guinea loves it
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig refuses to eat any other dry food except this. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy Pigs
customer_reviews.text: The pigs seem to love it, but I am not sure how they would say they don't. They are pigs... and they eat it and are fat :) SCORE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Bag broken...food scattered all over inside the box
customer_reviews.text: When I opended the box, there was a split in the bag and the food was all over the box. Not happy and what a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Maddox

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pig loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food my guinea pig will eat. He loves the dried carrots and whole pumpkin seeds.
customer_reviews.author: BookStorm

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Our new little guinea pig seems to love it. Much bigger than I realized - definitely better value than in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: C.N.

customer_reviews.title: They will pick through for the stuff they like rather than get a full healthy diet
customer_reviews.text: personally I'd just go with lab blocks and fresh food rather than this compromise. They will pick through for the stuff they like rather than get a full healthy diet.
customer_reviews.author: odarrow

customer_reviews.title: Lost of kind of fruit
customer_reviews.text: I brought this products for my Guinea pig. Is a good food with alot of flavor in it.
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Our piggies love it. You can even use the little stars as a treat. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Zartler

customer_reviews.title: Pigs love it and it seems to be a balanced diet
customer_reviews.text: Pigs love it and it seems to be a balanced diet. LOL they do move the dried bananas out of the bowl and refuse to eat them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GPs love 'em
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pigs love this. Lots of real food included- seeds fruits- heck! I'd eat it! ;) (Three more words are apparently required!)
customer_reviews.author: A. Gurowitz

customer_reviews.title: This is my pig's favorite food. I didn't pay attention on the size ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my pig's favorite food. I didn't pay attention on the size so we'll have it forever :-)
customer_reviews.author: P.J. DeCamp

customer_reviews.title: MY PIGGIES LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE FOUR GUINEA PIGS AND TWO OF THEM WEREN'T FOND OF OTHER BRANDS OF FOOD I PUT THIS IN AND THEY ALL LOVE IT! GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our guinea pigs don't care for this. I don't know why since other people say their guineas do.
customer_reviews.author: jtmoderate876

customer_reviews.title: the guinea pigs love it
customer_reviews.text: The guinea pigs (we have 4)dont complain, although I mix it 50-50 with the straight dry pellets. It is a big bag, good bargain vs the pet stores.
customer_reviews.author: T.Swift

customer_reviews.title: Our Guinea loves this.
customer_reviews.text: Our Guinea loves this. He starts wheeking any time we rustle a bag of chips etc, as he thinks it is his food.
customer_reviews.author: EJFleming

customer_reviews.title: good variety
customer_reviews.text: they love the bananas. good price. nice variety to it. good mix of various things.
customer_reviews.author: drewdog235

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I''m very unhappy with this product. Our pet Guinea Pig won't even touch this food.
customer_reviews.author: marian schade

customer_reviews.title: but the guinea pigs like the seeds and dried fruit
customer_reviews.text: I bit expensive, but the guinea pigs like the seeds and dried fruit.
customer_reviews.author: T. Yeager

customer_reviews.title: My Guinea pigs love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have three guinea pigs and they all just LOVE the Tropical Carnival Food. I have one finicky pig and he picks all of his favorites out of the mix! Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: C. Mcclay

customer_reviews.title: She's been eating it for years and is still healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig loves this food. She's been eating it for years and is still healthy and happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Strom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My Oreo loves it and I smell lot of fruits inside the bag and fresh I recommend this tropical Carnival bag
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA  BATISTA

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a large bag
customer_reviews.text: My Guinea Pig loves this stuff! Great price for a large bag.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pigs love this
customer_reviews.text: My guineas love it they don't want to stop eating it. It also works great for making treats. I'll be buying this again. also like the 10 lb size
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pig ate it so I guess its good.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know. My guinea pig ate it so I guess its good.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C. Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have a picky Guinea pig, this is the only food he will eat.
customer_reviews.author: Spooky

customer_reviews.title: Guinea Pigs Love Their Food!
customer_reviews.text: As long as my guinea pigs like the product, then I like it too. I've never tasted it; I won't; I'll let the guinea pigs continue to be the judge.
customer_reviews.author: Da-sein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is our guinea pigs favorite food. It has a great variety of flavors that they enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Monsivais

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food our 2 guinea pigs love to eat if I have to buy a different kind when I can't get this one they waste it
customer_reviews.author: BRATSY76

customer_reviews.title: My guinea pig is so picky! He hates most ...
customer_reviews.text: My guinea pig is so picky! He hates most all food, but he lives the variety that tropical carnival provides!
customer_reviews.author: froggyfee

product_meta.title: F.M. Brown's Tropical Carnival Gourmet Guinea Pig Food with Alfalfa and Timothy Hay Pellets - Vitamin-Nutrient Fortified Daily Diet
product_meta.description: Brown’s Tropical Carnival Guinea Pig food is a vitamin-fortified food and treat, all-in-one. This premium gourmet food is nutritious and specially blended for the daily dietary needs of guinea pigs, including our alfalfa and timothy hay pellets formulated for optimum digestion. With added Vitamin C to help maintain a strong immune system. Your guinea pigs will find Tropical Carnival simply irresistible.
feature_bullets: VITAMIN-NUTRIENT-FORTIFIED: Specially formulated for the daily dietary needs of guinea pigs
SUPPORT GOOD DIGESTION: Added probiotics help stimulate good digestion so your guinea pig can get the most out of our nutrient-rich ingredients
IMMUNE SYSTEM SUPPORT: We add stabilized vitamin C, a necessary supplemnt for guinea pig health, to help maintain a healthy immune system
FIBER RICH: Timothy hay and alfalfa pellets are high in fiber for optimal digestion
ZOO-VITAL BISCUITS: Includes our specially formulated ZOO-VITAL Biscuits for healthy teeth and gums with nutrients required for the well-being of your guinea pig
